title: Matchsafe, "British Football", 1905–06
markings: S M & Co, lion passant, town mark (Chester), date letter "E" are all stamped on bezel. On reverse bezel is partially legible number  _467827. Lion passsant and date letter "E" also stamped on front of lid.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the form of a round, British football, front ribbed and laced down the center. Reverse ribbed, inscribed "Strike boldly, then your light will shine clear. Affly." Lid (upper section of ball) hinged on left side. Link attached on left side. Striker recessed in bottom

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "British Football", 1905–06.
1905–06. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-157.
